name: Nharyth
description: A huge aberration with chaotic features, it exhibits a powerful presence and grotesque attributes. Its body is characterized by the chaotic nature of its spines and malformations.
memorable: Its ability to create difficult terrain with spine traps and paralyze foes makes it an intimidating opponent.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate foes, using its traps and debilitating attacks.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other aberrations or creatures that dwell in darkness.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas, possibly underground or in hidden lairs.
strengths: High resilience with substantial hit points and several resistances; immune to conditions that would hinder its combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma suggest vulnerability in mental challenges and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack options with powerful spined slap and ranged spine shot attacks, able to inflict paralysis on hitting opponents.
most_powerful_ability: The devastating Spine Trap, which can create hazardous terrain that ensnares and paralyzes enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 120 feet, allowing it to navigate effectively in total darkness.
skills: Excels in perception and stealth, making it a formidable ambusher.
additional_information: Resistant to bludgeoning and psychic damage
Immune to being blinded, deafened, and paralyzed
Can create a web of nearly transparent spines
Can plant up to 24 spines before needing a long rest
Paralyzes opponents that get ensnared by its traps
test_queries: large monster that can fly and paralyze
huge chaotic creature that hides spines
monster with strong perceptive abilities and traps
